languages.text: {n}Абеляр устремляет на вас осуждающий взгляд.{/n} "Вы мараете имя фон Валанциус, приглашая в свою свиту подобных людей, Лорд-капитан. Дело ваше, только не удивляйтесь, если по Футфолу поползут дурные слухи".

{n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The decision is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр устремляет на вас осуждающий взгляд.{/n} "Вы мараете имя фон Валанциус, приглашая в свою свиту подобных людей, Лорд-капитан. Дело ваше, только не удивляйтесь, если по Футфолу поползут дурные слухи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The call is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."

{n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The call is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."

{n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The decision is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."

{n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The decision is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."

{n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The decision is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德以责备的眼神看了你一眼。{/n}“您邀请她这样的人加入您的行列，舰长大人，这是在玷污冯·瓦兰修斯家族的声誉。决定权在您手里，但如果落脚港开始出现流言的话，希望您不要感到惊讶。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The decision is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德以责备的眼神看了你一眼。{/n}“您邀请她这样的人加入您的行列，舰长大人，这是在玷污冯·瓦兰修斯家族的声誉。决定权在您手里，但如果落脚港开始出现流言的话，希望您不要感到惊讶。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard te lanza una mirada de desaprobación.{/n} «Al invitar a gente como ella a su séquito, Lord Capitán, mancillas el nombre von Valancius. La decisión es suya, pero que no le sorprenda si comienzan a correr rumores desagradables por Paso».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The decision is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard te lanza una mirada de desaprobación.{/n} «Al invitar a gente como ella a su séquito, Lord Capitán, mancillas el nombre von Valancius. La decisión es suya, pero que no le sorprenda si comienzan a correr rumores desagradables por Paso».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドが責めるような視線を向ける。{/n}「彼女のような人間を仲間に加えることは、フォン・ヴァランシウスの名を汚すことになります、ロード・キャプテン。決定はあなた次第ですが、フットフォールでよくない噂が広まり始めても驚きません」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The decision is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドが責めるような視線を向ける。{/n}「彼女のような人間を仲間に加えることは、フォン・ヴァランシウスの名を汚すことになります、ロード・キャプテン。決定はあなた次第ですが、フットフォールでよくない噂が広まり始めても驚きません」

languages.text: {n}Abelard wirft dir einen vorwurfsvollen Blick zu.{/n} "Ihr befleckt den Namen von Valancius, wenn Ihr Leute wie sie in Euer Gefolge einladet, Lord Captain. Es ist Eure Entscheidung, aber seid nicht überrascht, wenn bald unangenehme Gerüchte auf Footfall die Runde machen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The decision is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard wirft dir einen vorwurfsvollen Blick zu.{/n} "Ihr befleckt den Namen von Valancius, wenn Ihr Leute wie sie in Euer Gefolge einladet, Lord Captain. Es ist Eure Entscheidung, aber seid nicht überrascht, wenn bald unangenehme Gerüchte auf Footfall die Runde machen."

languages.text: {n}Abélard vous lance un regard de reproche.{/n} « Vous salissez le nom des von Valancius en invitant des gens comme elle à vous suivre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le choix vous appartient, mais ne soyez pas {mf|surpris|surprise} si des rumeurs peu reluisantes commencent à courir à Castel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The decision is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard vous lance un regard de reproche.{/n} « Vous salissez le nom des von Valancius en invitant des gens comme elle à vous suivre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Le choix vous appartient, mais ne soyez pas {mf|surpris|surprise} si des rumeurs peu reluisantes commencent à courir à Castel. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard sana sitemkâr bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Onun gibileri maiyetinize katarak von Valancius adına leke sürüyorsunuz Lord Kaptan. Karar sizin lakin Binliman'da nahoş söylentiler yayılmaya başlarsa şaşırmayın."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a look of reproach.{/n} "You sully the von Valancius name by inviting people like her into your retinue, Lord Captain. The decision is yours, but do not be surprised if unsavoury rumours start to spread on Footfall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard sana sitemkâr bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Onun gibileri maiyetinize katarak von Valancius adına leke sürüyorsunuz Lord Kaptan. Karar sizin, lakin Binliman'da nahoş söylentiler yayılmaya başlarsa şaşırmayın."
